name: grid-of10
description: Responsive columns based on a 10-column grid (so 5-columns as well) and compatible with Basscss.

scripts.prepublish: mkdir -p css && postcss index.css -u postcss-import -u postcss-custom-media -u postcss-custom-properties -u autoprefixer -o css/grid-of10.css

author: Mat Sachs <matochondrion@gmail.com> (http://www.matsachs.com)
